message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a deal now, as the money will be worth less with each round.
I think we can do better.  I'm willing to split it 60/40, with me getting the bigger share. Since the money is worth less each round, I think it's in our best interest to reach an agreement now.

Bob, let's be reasonable.  My offer in Round 1 was more than fair. I understand you want a good deal, but this is getting ridiculous.  I'm willing to take a little less to end this now, but I won't accept anything less than $55.
